charges.charge_description: 18:922G.F UNLAWFUL TRANSPORT OF FIREARMS, ETC. (Possession of a firearm by a convicted felon)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 194 months, 180 months on Count One and 194 months on Count Three, to run concurrently; Court recommends defendant be afforded drug therapy and opportunity to further his education; SUPERVISED RELEASE: 3 years, term of 3 years on each Count One and Three, to run concurrently; Mandatory drug testing requirements are Imposed; Special conditions of supervised release: participate in a substance abuse program, participate in a mental health treatment program, perform 75 hours of community service, cooperate in collection of DNA; Federal benefits are denied permanently; Forfeiture pursuant to the Plea Agreement; Special Assessment: $200.00 due immediately. (3/4/08 REDUCED TO 132 MONTHS IMPRISONMENT)

charges.charge_description: 26:5861D.F UNLAWFUL TO RECEIVE A FIREARM NOT REGISTERED (Possession an unregistered NFA firearm)(2)
